weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria records 28 new coronavirus cases, its lowest daily tally in almost three months
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria recorded 28 new coronavirus cases today, the state's lowest daily tally since late June. Victoria's 14 day average is now within the 30-50 target needed to ease restrictions on the 28th.

weeklyTopNews.title: Some restrictions to ease as Victoria records no coronavirus deaths for the first time in over two months
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria reported 42 new cases today and reported zero deaths overnight for the first time in 2 months. Regional Victoria may move into the next stage for easing restrictions on Thursday.

weeklyTopNews.title: 'A mighty effort': Victoria reports lowest one-day rise in coronavirus cases in nearly three months
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria reported 35 new coronavirus cases this week, the lowest daily increase since June 26th when 30 new cases were reported.

weeklyTopNews.title: Lifeline for Victorian businesses unveiled, as Melbourne COVID-19 lockdown relaxed from midnight
weeklyTopNews.summary: Metropolitan Melbourne prepares for the easing of coronavirus regulations from midnight and the Victorian government has announced a $3 billion business support package to assist local buisnesses.

weeklyTopNews.title: Lifeline for Victorian businesses unveiled, as Melbourne COVID-19 lockdown relaxed from midnight
weeklyTopNews.summary: Metropolitan Melbourne prepares for the easing of coronavirus regulations from midnight and the Victorian government has announced a $3 billion business support package to assist local buisnesses.

weeklyTopNews.title: Lifeline for Victorian businesses unveiled, as Melbourne COVID-19 lockdown relaxed from midnight
weeklyTopNews.summary: Metropolitan Melbourne prepares for the easing of coronavirus regulations from midnight and the Victorian government has announced a $3 billion business support package to assist local buisnesses.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria police arrest 14 people at illegal anti-lockdown protests in Melbourne
weeklyTopNews.summary: The Victoria police have arrested 14 people at illegal anti-lockdown protests in Melbourne and issued 51 fines. 100 people attended these protests, which were spread throughout the city.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria's new coronavirus cases fall to lowest level since June as Australian death toll exceeds 800
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria announced 37 new coronavirus cases today, the state's lowest daily tally since 26 June. All of the cases were in metropolitan Melbourne.
